article_title: ObamaCare's Medicaid Expansion Equals Taxation Without Representation (Are You Listening, Mike Pence?)

article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: The burden of paying for the expansion will fall on voters who haven’t even been born yet.
